links.*: Paul Raymond Gregory: From the World of Tolkien

wikitext.*:
'''Paul Raymond Gregory''' ([[1949]]) is an artist who has created [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]-inspired illustrations. He produced the artwork for [[Blind Guardian|Blind Guardian's]] ''A Night at the Opera''.
